document.full_text: a pope john paul ii statue at the termini train station in rome has been criticized to the point that a city commission has been named to rule on it.
document.title: rome journal: a statue of pope john paul ii brings out the critic in italians
lines_and_colors: a pope john paul ii statue at the termini train station in rome has been criticized to the point that a city commission has been named to rule on it.
